description:
As Yotsuya`s party is traveling in order to complete the sixth quest, they meet Jezby, a girl being attacked by monsters. They save Jezby and take her back to her village. There, after determining that they need to protect this village to complete the quest, Yotsuya and Glenda meet a girl named Iris, who happens to be the village chief`s granddaughter. Iris convinces them to visit the village chief`s home, but he has a dislike for heroes and traps the two of them.
Source: crunchyroll
